timeline.bodyText:
If the use of this capability outside this subsystem only needs a dependency for ordering reasons and doesn't need access to a particular type, then the capability should not provide a type, as that becomes an unneeded part of its API contract.
ServerAdd in messaging-activemq doesn't seem to need anything but a dependency; it doesn't inject.
If that's the case in other external uses, internal-to-the-subsystem wiring that might need to inject ChannelUpgradeHandler doesn't have to use the capability.
timeline.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText:
The endpoint @rachmatowicz has in mind is this one:
https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-core/blob/2f3e21463e446fc5aad1e5b24f4ec1222e02e9ab/remoting/subsystem/src/main/java/org/jboss/as/remoting/RemotingHttpUpgradeService.java#L131
Thus, I believe the service type should be part of the capability contract.
replies.author: pferraro

replies.bodyText:
OK, thanks. @fl4via should look at this overall, but in particular that point as it makes the contract a bit stronger to include it in the capability registry.
Of course the coupling already exists but when things get formalized like this that's a good time to confirm the contracts are what's wanted.
Thanks, @rachmatowicz for digging into this stuff; it's good to get these contracts in place.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: Nit: that line is too long. :) It's good to see these contracts without scrolling.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: @bstansberry  you have my okay, I think the contract is what's wanted, given the usage in wfcore pointed by @pferraro
replies.author: fl4via

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps the field should be @ Deprecated in that case to let other subsystems know.
timeline.author: rhusar

timeline.bodyText:
Since serviceBuilder is a CapabilityServiceBuilder, use:
serviceBuilder.addCapabilityRequirement(Capabilities.REF_HTTP_LISTENER_REGISTRY, ListenerRegistry.class, ((HttpListenerService) service).getHttpListenerRegistry());
timeline.author: pferraro

timeline.bodyText:
